name: fornicator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who has sex with someone who they are not married to: I have no sympathy for liars or fornicators. The apostle declares that no fornicator can enter into the kingdom of God. See
fornicate
More examplesFewer examplesThe New Testament says, "God will judge fornicators and adulterers."She is a fornicator who has shown time and again that she can not be trusted.He was accused of being an adulterer and a fornicator.
